name: SocialCar
overview:
Social Car is the first and leading Peer-To-Peer Car Sharing company in Spain.

Based in Barcelona, founded in January 2011 and launched in June 2011, Social Car with its growing fleet of cars is already present in more than 60 cities in Spain.

Social Car allows owners to make money renting out their car while it is not used. At the same time it offers a good deal to drivers and a flexible and more sustainable car rental/sharing solution to the drivers. There are no membership fees and there is a full insurance and customer support.
